channel.title: News and Updates on Paris Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in News and Updates on Paris Personal Blog

item.title: Content Creation Collection Toolbox Launched!
item.description: I am pleased to be a part of the content creation collection toolbox this year.

item.title: 2018 State of Paris
item.description: It’s time to “review the tapes” of the past year. This will be the second year in a row that I do this. I wrote a review post last year, and 2014 before that.

item.title: ParisALaw.com is now Parislaw.net
item.description: I'm finally ready to make the move to parislaw.net. There is a logic behind the madness. Why switch It was harder for people to remember parisalaw.com.

item.title: Hanging out with Mr. Dashfire in Minnesota
item.description: Day 2 in the twin cities of Minnesota and I got the opportunity to hang out with Mr. Dashfire - http://www.dashfirebitters.com himself.

item.title: Wordpress training series is two weeks away
item.description: I'm excited and nervous at the same time. I've working on my own wordpress websites for years. I started helping others build their own.

item.title: Leveling Up My LinkedIN Skills
item.description: In 2012, I gave a presentation at a B2B marketing conference on the topic of social media in a business context.
